name: ChatterFavorites

methods.name: addFavorite
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedFavorite addFavorite(String communityId, String subjectId, String searchText)
methods.description: Add a feed search favorite for a user.

methods.name: addRecordFavorite
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedFavorite addRecordFavorite(String communityId, String subjectId, String targetId)
methods.description: Add a topic as a favorite.

methods.name: deleteFavorite
methods.signature: public static Void deleteFavorite(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId)

methods.name: getFavorite
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedFavorite getFavorite(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId)

methods.name: getFavorites
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedFavorites getFavorites(String communityId, String subjectId)
methods.description: Get a list of favorites for a user.

methods.name: getFeedElements
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedElementPage getFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId)
methods.description: Get the first page of feed elements for a favorite.

methods.name: getFeedElements
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedElementPage getFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.FeedSortOrder sortParam)
methods.description: Get a page of sorted feed elements for a favorite.

methods.name: getFeedElements
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedElementPage getFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, Integer recentCommentCount, Integer elementsPerBundle, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.FeedSortOrder sortParam)
methods.description: Get a page of sorted feed elements for a favorite. Include no more than the specified number of comments per feed element.

methods.name: getFeedItems
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedItemPage getFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId)
methods.description: Get the first page of feed items for a favorite.

methods.name: getFeedItems
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedItemPage getFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.FeedSortOrder sortParam)
methods.description: Get a page of sorted feed items for a favorite.

methods.name: getFeedItems
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedItemPage getFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, Integer recentCommentCount, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, FeedSortOrder sortParam)
methods.description: Get a page of sorted feed items for a favorite. Include no more than the specified number of comments per feed item.

methods.name: updateFavorite
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FeedFavorite updateFavorite(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, Boolean updateLastViewDate)
methods.description: Update the last view date of the saved search or list view feed to the current system time.

methods.name: setTestGetFeedElements
methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, ConnectApi.FeedElementPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedElementPage object to be returned when getFeedElements​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.FeedSortOrder sortParam, ConnectApi.FeedElementPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedElementPage object to be returned when getFeedElements​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

methods.name: setTestGetFeedElements
methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedElements(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, Integer recentCommentCount, Integer elementsPerBundle, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.FeedSortOrder sortParam, ConnectApi.FeedElementPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedElementPage object to be returned when getFeedElements​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

methods.name: setTestGetFeedItems
methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, ConnectApi.FeedItemPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedItemPage object to be returned when getFeedItems​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, FeedSortOrder sortParam, ConnectApi.FeedItemPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedItemPage object to be returned when getFeedItems​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

methods.name: setTestGetFeedItems
methods.signature: public static Void setTestGetFeedItems(String communityId, String subjectId, String favoriteId, Integer recentCommentCount, String pageParam, Integer pageSize, FeedSortOrder sortParam, ConnectApi.FeedItemPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.FeedItemPage object to be returned when getFeedItems​ is called with matching parameters in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or the code throws an exception.

description: Chatter favorites give you easy access to topics, list views, and feed
